Modules.Title: Basic Python Syntax
Content: Indentation is VERY important when using Python
Indentation refers to the spaces at the beginning of a code line.
Python uses 4 spaces to indent code lines.
Put a # before a line of code to comment out that line of code.

QuestionPool.Question: What is the correct indentation for Python?
Answers: Indentation is not important in python

QuestionPool.Question: What character is used for putting lines of code in comment using Python?
